DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : This descriptive study primary objective determine incidence injection site systemic adverse event Triaxis administration 5th dose tetanus , diphtheria acellular pertussis vaccine 4-6 year old child
DOC.brief_title: Post Authorisation Safety Study Triaxis 5th Dose 4-6 Year Old Spanish Children

Have receive , day enrolment , immunisation Triaxis 5th dose diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis vaccination routine practice accordance Spanish version EU SmPC Spanish immunisation recommendation .
